short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you import profiles from the web into Avature by importing downloaded files as person records in Avature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To get started, please contact your Avature representative or reach out to techsupport@avature.net.
